name: Shadow Dungeon (dummyuser172)
description:
Developed by dummyuser172 & CodingGoose

This is our 2022 Brackeys game jam submissions. Follow your cloaked character through the Shadow Dungeons, fight slimes and solving puzzles. You are gifted 10 lanterns to use accordingly. Enter the shadow world for a moment, and place your light wielding lanterns to destroy all that is not real around you.

Controls
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • TAB to enter the "Shadow Realm"
  • Click to attack in the real world
  • You can place lanterns by left clicking in the Shadow Realm
  • Movement caused by you is disabled in the shadow realm
  • Lanterns can destroy crates
  • Pushing barrels into crates causes it to explode
  • Get to the yellow portal to get into the next stage
